recipesJson.name: Black Sheep Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: R2ME2
recipesJson.description: In this recipe Bilberry, Forest Fruit and Blueberry Wild come together to make the perfect dark fruit berry blend for this tasty treat. NY Cheesecake at this ratio adds the perfect amount of creaminess and tang. FA Custard brightens the fruit by adding a twist of lemon and brings all the layers together. CAP Sugar Cookie creates a light sweet crunchy crust. Sometimes I sub FW Graham Cracker at 1.5% for a different twist. Give it a try, I hope you like it as much as I do.  I'd love to get some feedback on this one.
